### CCGS Samuel Risley Fire System Inspection Tender

#### Notice Details
| **Category** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-__ML-032-29398 |
| **Solicitation Number** | F2599-240190/A |
| **Publication Date** | 23 September 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 15 October 2024 at 14:00 EDT |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |

#### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for the following contract:

Annual Fire Protection System Equipment Maintenance and Hydrostatic Bottles for the CCGS Samuel Risley

The scope of work includes:

* Annual fire system inspection
* Complete maintenance of portable and fixed fire extinguishers systems
* Hydrostatic testing and recharge of FM 200 cylinders
* Installation of a missing connection between the FM 200 station and two fire dampers on the CCGS Samuel Risley

#### Mandatory Technical Criteria
Please refer to the solicitation documentation for these criteria.

#### Tendering Procedures
All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

#### Competitive Procurement Strategy
The lowest bid will be selected.

#### Document Submission
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Note
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Contact Information
Simon Bourque,  
Public Works and Government Services Canada,  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada,  
Phone: (514) 893-5308,  
Email: simon.bourque@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

---

### Note
Please find the technical documentation mentioned in the solicitation as attachments to the solicitation. The bid solicitation has a closing of 15 October 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
